response.original_title: LIVE SECRETION: They Feed at Night & Bell Tower Bats
response.overview: LIVE SECRETION is a live DVD that captures They Feed At Night & Bell Tower Bats at their most atrocious. Recorded all on Hi-8 film in 2016 during their "Night Tower" release show. It also contains a screen-printed disc, and footage of the infamous blood & semen offerings.  Recorded in 2016.
response.title: LIVE SECRETION: They Feed at Night & Bell Tower Bats
